title: Save thousands on a car by stacking Trump's tax credits with Biden's
shortDescription: Presidents Donald Trump and Joe Biden created car-buying incentives. Here's how to take advantage of both before Biden's expires in September.

title: ICE agents burning out amid Trump's aggressive enforcement
shortDescription: As ICE launches a recruitment effort to hire 10,000 more officers, existing staff struggle with long hours, growing public outrage.

title: Trump says he will sign executive order requiring voter ID
shortDescription: Trump has falsely claimed that his 2020 loss to Democratic President Joe Biden was the result of widespread fraud.

title: Judge blocks Trump from deporting unaccompanied Guatemalan children
shortDescription: The lawsuit argued that the plan to expel the children violates protections under the Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act.

title: Chicago mayor pushes back on Trump's troop plan
shortDescription: Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson launched Protecting Chicago Initiative to fight back against President Trump's possible federal troop deployment.

title: Defiant Chicago mayor says city will stand up to Trump's 'tyranny'
shortDescription: Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson laid out how the nation's third-largest city will respond if President Trump deploys the National Guard.

title: Trump solves White House whodunit: the Rose Garden edition
shortDescription: Trump announced that he had successfully found the culprit who caused a "huge gash" in the Rose Garden's new limestone.

title: Court strikes down Trump tariffs
shortDescription: The appeals court ruled 7-4 that President Trump overstepped his authority when he imposed sweeping tariffs.

title: Trump spotted golfing in Virginia over Labor Day weekend
shortDescription: The president was also seen with two of his grandchildren.

title: Cassidy RFK Jr vote spotlighted as he calls for CDC 'oversight'
shortDescription: Some health experts say Cassidy deserves blame for CDC turmoil as a doctor who was concerned about Kennedyâ€™s vaccine views but voted to confirm him.

title: Kehoe touts plan to redraw Congressional map in Missouri, gets Trump praise
shortDescription: If Missouri redistricts a new map, the state's redraw could possibly add one more Republican seat and lose one Democratic seat.

title: 'Keep it peaceful,' Chicago top cop warns ahead of Trump deployment
shortDescription: The head of the Chicago Police Department warned protesters in the city that the rules of engagement for federal troops are different than for police.

title: Most Trump tariffs are illegal, appeals court rules
shortDescription: President Trump said he planned to appeal to the Supreme Court to seek to overturn an appeals court ruling that most of his tariffs are illegal.

title: Trump yanks Secret Service detail for Kamala Harris. What's Plan B?
shortDescription: Big gaps between protection provided by Secret Service and private firms could put her in danger, former Secret Service officials say.

title: Trump moves to bypass Congress to rescind $5 billion in foreign aid
shortDescription: President Trump is seeking to bypass Congress to rescind $4.9 billion in foreign aid funding, setting up a clash with lawmakers and perhaps in court.

title: Iowa US Sen. Joni Ernst expected to announce she won't seek reelection
shortDescription: Ernst, a Republican, was elected in 2014 and is the first woman elected to Congress from Iowa and the Senate's first female combat veteran.

title: Officials bristle as Trump readies flood of ICE agents in Chicago
shortDescription: Trump border czar Tom Homan said Immigration and Customs Enforcement might use a naval base just north of Chicago as an operations center.
